attributes.action: Leave Gateshead’s Special School Post-16 provision alone!
attributes.additional_details:
The proposal has been put together as a cost cutting exercise with no credible research into the effect it will have on outcomes for young people.  There is no long term strategic view to support young people who may subsequently become NEET and will require significant support from adult services.

The Cabinet report for this proposal is available at http://democracy.gateshead.gov.uk/ieIssueDetails.aspx?IId=9833&PlanId=0&Opt=3#AI7845
attributes.background: The Local Authority are looking at limiting Post-16 special school provision for young people with additional needs in Gateshead. This will limit Gateshead’s most vulnerable young people’s choice of Post-16 provisions and cut the amount of time they can spend within these provisions.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is a matter for Gateshead Council. 

You could start a petition on the council's website:

https://www.gateshead.gov.uk/article/2897/Petitions
